## Validation.Classes.OneOfValidator class

An in-place [Validator](./ts-utils.validator.md) which validates that a supplied value matches one of several other validators.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class OneOfValidator<T, TC = unknown> extends ValidatorBase<T, TC> 
```
**Extends:** ValidatorBase&lt;T, TC&gt;
